content: अपहन् {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To ward or beat off, repel, destroy, kill, take away, remove; अपघ्नंतो दुरितं हव्यगंधैः <ls>Ś. 4. 7</ls>; न तु खलु तयोर्ज्ञाने शक्तिं करोत्यपहंति वा <ls>U. 2. 4</ls> takes away; <ls>Ms. 6. 96</ls>; अपहतपाप्मानं सवितारमुपतिष्ठस्व <ls>U. 3.</ls> {@--2@} To attack, affect, seize (as disease &c.). {@--3@} To husk out, take off the shell or husk (as rice). {@--4@} To shoot out.
